import React from 'react' import './Booking.css' import {Form,FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button} from 'reactstrap' export const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} =tour const handleChange = e=>{} return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating ===0 ? null :avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
